assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Asahipen Corporation manufactures, imports, and sells various paints and painting supplies, and household supplies in Japan. The company offers aqueous, oil, and spray paints, as well as paint auxiliary materials; painting supplies, including brushes, rollers, kotebakes, roller trays, painting machines/compressors, painting aids, curing supplies, containers, and polishing supplies; repair materials for cover, floor, joints, metal products, wood parts, base adjustment, and concrete; and repair tape and pale bucket, as well as insulation and waterproofing materials for roofs. It also provides interior goods, such as shoji paper, bran paper, cover paper, adhesive sheets, glass decoration and condensation products, floor material, glue and double-sided tapes, repair maintenance materials, and various tools; home care products comprising, floor waxes, cleaning agents, bleaching and fungicides, home detergent and cleaners, kitchen detergents and hygiene management supplies, waterproof/water repellents, graffiti droppings, polishing/removers, and lubricants; and gardening supplies. The company was formerly known as Asahi Paint Company and changed its name to Asahipen Corporation in January 1965. Asahipen Corporation was founded in 1940 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
